verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Jehova <S%H3068><s%> is my light <S%H216><s%> and my salvation <S%H3468><s%>; Whom shall I fear <S%H3372><s%>? Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is the strength <S%H4581><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%>; Of whom shall I be afraid <S%H6342><s%>?

When evil-doers <S%H7489><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> upon me to eat up <S%H398><s%> my flesh <S%H1320><s%>, Even mine adversaries <S%H6862><s%> and my foes <S%H341><s%>, they stumbled <S%H3782><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%>.

Though a host <S%H4264><s%> should encamp <S%H2583><s%> against me <S%H3820><s%>, My heart shall not fear <S%H3372><s%>: Though war <S%H4421><s%> should rise <S%H6965><s%> against me <S%H982><s%>, Even then will I be confident.

One <S%H259><s%> thing have I asked <S%H7592><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that will I seek <S%H1245><s%> after <S%H3427><s%>; That I may dwell in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%>, To behold <S%H2372><s%> the beauty <S%H5278><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And to inquire <S%H1239><s%> in his temple <S%H1964><s%>.

For in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H7451><s%> he will keep me secretly <S%H6845><s%> in his pavilion <S%H5520><s%>: In the covert <S%H5643><s%> of his tabernacle <S%H168><s%> will he hide <S%H5641><s%> me <S%H7311><s%>; He will lift me up upon a rock <S%H6697><s%>.

And now shall my head <S%H7218><s%> be lifted up <S%H7311><s%> above mine enemies <S%H341><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> me <S%H2076><s%>. And I will offer in his tabernacle <S%H168><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of joy <S%H8643><s%>; I will sing <S%H7891><s%>, yea <S%H2167><s%>, I will sing praises unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when I cry <S%H7121><s%> with my voice <S%H6963><s%>: Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> also upon me <S%H6030><s%>, and answer me.
When thou saidst <S%H1245><s%>, Seek ye my face <S%H6440><s%>; My heart <S%H3820><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto thee <S%H6440><s%>, Thy face, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, will I seek <S%H1245><s%>.

Hide <S%H5641><s%> not thy face <S%H6440><s%> from me <S%H5186><s%>; Put not thy servant <S%H5650><s%> away <S%H5186><s%> in anger <S%H639><s%>: Thou hast been my help <S%H5833><s%>; Cast <S%H5203><s%> me not off <S%H5800><s%>, neither forsake me <S%H430><s%>, O God of my salvation <S%H3468><s%>.
When my father <S%H1><s%> and my mother <S%H517><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, Then Jehovah will take me up <S%H622><s%>.
Teach <S%H3384><s%> me thy way <S%H1870><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And lead <S%H5148><s%> me in a plain <S%H4334><s%> path <S%H734><s%>, Because of mine enemies <S%H8324><s%>.

Deliver <S%H5414><s%> me not over unto the will <S%H5315><s%> of mine adversaries <S%H6862><s%>: For false <S%H8267><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%> are risen up <S%H6965><s%> against me <S%H3307><s%>, And such as breathe out cruelty <S%H2555><s%>.
I had fainted <S%H3884><s%>, unless I had believed <S%H539><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the goodness <S%H2898><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> In the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>.
Wait <S%H6960><s%> for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Be strong <S%H553><s%>, And let thy heart <S%H3820><s%> take courage <S%H2388><s%>; Yea <S%H6960><s%>, wait thou for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
